mapper.select: select IFNULL(MAX(id2), 0) + 1 as id2, RPAD(#{temp_board_code}, CHAR_LENGTH(#{temp_board_code}) + CHAR_LENGTH((IFNULL(MAX(id2), 1) + 1)) + 1, '0') + IFNULL(MAX(id2), 0) + 1 as board_code from board_mst where id1 = #{board_type_code}

SELECT bm.board_code, bm.user_code, bm.board_title, bm.progress_status, bm.create_date,
ifnull(um.user_name, nmt.user_name) as user_name,
pct.company_name,
tc.total_count FROM board_mst bm LEFT OUTER JOIN board_file bf ON(bf.board_code = bm.board_code) LEFT OUTER JOIN user_mst um ON(um.user_code = bm.user_code) LEFT OUTER JOIN non_member_table nmt on(nmt.board_code = bm.board_code) LEFT OUTER JOIN product_company_table pct on(pct.company_code = bm.company_code) LEFT OUTER JOIN (select count(*) as total_count from board_mst where
user_code = #{user_code} AND
board_title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
board_content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
(board_title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or board_content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
and
board_type_code = #{board_type_code}) tc on(1=1) WHERE
bm.user_code = #{user_code} AND
board_title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
board_content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
(board_title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or board_content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
and
bm.board_type_code = #{board_type_code} GROUP BY bm.board_code LIMIT #{page}, 2;

SELECT bm.company_code, bm.board_title, bm.board_content, bm.progress_status, bm.create_date, bm.response_flag,
IFNULL(um.user_name, nmt.user_name) AS user_name, IFNULL(um.user_email, nmt.user_email) AS user_email, IFNULL(ud.main_phone_number, nmt.main_phone_number) AS main_phone_number,
bf.file_code, bf.file_name,
pct.company_name FROM board_mst bm LEFT OUTER JOIN board_file bf ON(bf.board_code = bm.board_code) LEFT OUTER JOIN user_mst um ON(um.user_code = bm.user_code) LEFT OUTER JOIN user_dtl ud on(ud.user_code = um.user_code) LEFT OUTER JOIN non_member_table nmt on(nmt.board_code = bm.board_code) LEFT OUTER JOIN product_company_table pct on(pct.company_code = bm.company_code) WHERE bm.board_code = #{board_code};
